headline: McKesson Corporation (MCK): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on McKesson Corporation on The Buyside Guy’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MCK. McKesson Corporation’s share was trading at $710.94 as of August 4th. MCK’s trailing and forward P/E were 27.17 and 18.69, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. McKesson (MCK) is one of the largest […]

headline: Can Sustained Product Demand Drive BDX Stock Before Q3 Earnings?
summary: BD's third-quarter fiscal 2025 results are likely to benefit from product launches across Medical and Interventional segments, which drive strong revenue potential.

summary: SOLV's Q2 earnings are likely to test whether solid segment growth can offset tariff and ERP-related pressures.

headline: Henry Schein Stock Falls on Q2 Earnings Miss, Revenues Top
summary: HSIC slides after Q2 EPS misses estimates by 6.8%. Revenues beat with 3.2% growth and strength across key segments.

headline: Will GLP-1 Demand Drive MCK's Top Line This Earnings Season?
summary: MCK's Q1 results are expected to reflect strong prescription volume growth from GLP-1 demand, but lower margins may weigh on profitability.
